attributes.action: Demand Spanish courts save Fuentes doping blood bags. Are athletes competing in Britain implicated?
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, petition the UK government to force the Spanish courts to save the blood bags found at Dr Fuentes office to give any authorities in Britain who may have a vested interest in knowing who has used his illegitimate services, may inform themselves of any information they may need to do their jobs.

Cheats who used Fuentes services may have, or even may still be competing in British sporting events, and we have a right to know who they are. As do all the athletes they are cheating against.
